title: Sin Eater
description: For six centuries the Sin Eater has roamed the earth, relieving humans of their sins so that the evil may linger to find new hosts before forgiveness can be granted and expel it for eternity.The forces of Good, however, have a few tricks up their sleeve. The Sin Eater will begin to learn that he is not as immortal as he originally believed.
author: C.D. Breadner
